articles.description: Twitter users couldn't get enough of an awkward video of Lady Gaga awkwardly explaining why she hadn't been to Caitlyn Jenner's usual Malibu Starbucks recently on Sunday.
articles.content:
Lady Gaga sent Twitter into meltdown on Sunday night as a clip of the singer appearing to brush off Caitlyn Jenner went viral.
In the video, filmed outside of Elton John AIDS Foundations 30th Annual… [+5500 chars]

articles.author: Bridie Pearson-jones
articles.title: Where are the cast of the Full Monty now? - Daily Mail
articles.description: The original cast of the 1997 British film hit The Full Monty have reunited for a new original series of the same name, set to air on Disney+ - with Robert Carlyle returning as Gaz.
articles.content:
The original cast of The Full Monty are set to reunite for a new series of the same name, set to air on Disney+, with filming commencing this week in Manchester and Sheffield.
